metadata.title: CVE-2024-35922 linux
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:  fbmon: prevent division by zero in fb_videomode_from_videomode()  The expression htotal * vtotal can have a zero value on overflow. It is necessary to prevent division by zero like in fb_var_to_videomode().  Found by Linux Verification Center (linuxtesting.org) with Svace.
